function.name: device_close
function.description: This function is used to fully close or partially close (use percent % for some) SmartThings devices with an on/off function.

location.description: The location where the is located.

room.description: The room where the device located.

device.description: The name or type of the device to close.

ration.description: The percentage to close the device.

number.description: The number to close the device.

groupAction.description: The group action to perform on the devices.
